input_text:
Job Title: Account Executive

Location: Kansas City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Job Title: Account Executive

FLSA Status: Exempt

Reports To: Director of Business Development

This Is Not a Remote Position.

POSITION SUMMARY:

We are actively seeking a results-driven Account Executive who will be selling to pre-qualified Smart Warehousing prospects across dozens of consumer-packaged goods and product company categories. As a Smart Warehousing Account Executive, you will work closely with our Sales Development Reps in ensuring prospects have an amazing first impression of our company! It will be important to understand our customer needs, and the dynamic service offerings we are able to provide them!

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: 

Actively and consistently supports all efforts to simplify and enhance the prospective customer experience. Conducts sales needs analysis with new and prospective customers, including the development of client-centric product solutions. Understands the communication needs of all sizes of customersDesigns solutions to meet those unique business needs, as well as ensuring they are the right fit for Smart Warehousing. Responsible for achieving a monthly sales quotaDesigns, develops, and delivers sales proposals and presentations. Maintains all sales databases in HubSpot necessary to report sales activity and customer information. Attends all sales meetings and training sessions as required by management. 

“THE PERSON” | MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:

1 or more years of experience in an account executive or sales-based roleExperience selling enterprise-level B2B SaaS solutions preferredSupply Chain knowledge preferredExcellent communication/presentation skills and ability to build relationshipsStrong organizational and time-management skillsKnowledge of HubSpot or other CRM

KEY ATTRIBUTES:

Competitive and proven results driven personVisionary, self-motivated, eager and up for the challenge to quickly scaleConfident, unwavering, and determinedA hands-on problem solver - intellectually curious and hard workingAble to communicate well cross-functionallyEnthusiastic and passionate personalityStandout colleagueAble to balance working individually with being part of a team. 

REASONS TO COME WORK FOR SMART:

At Smart we offer a wide range of employee benefits including, but not limited to:

Competitive compensation packagesA wide range of benefits including 401K with company match. Medical, Dental, and Vision healthcare plansParental leaveProfessional growth and internal promotion opportunities due to continuous organizational growthHoliday payFlexible work schedules for headquarter positions and multiple shift options for warehouse roles. 

Smart Warehousing is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment, and do not discriminate based on race, age, gender, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, status as a protected veteran, or status as an individual with a disability as well as all other characteristics and qualities protected by federal, state, or local law.

Smart Warehousing LLC collects personal online information. To read our Privacy Policy, click here.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
